name: Deepsea Alchemy
description:
Excavate, transmutate.

Humanity has just succeeded in building a submarine which can withstand the pressures of the deepest parts of the sea. You play as the submarine deep underwater, complying and completing mission control’s objectives. The seabed is filled with a variety of different minerals just waiting to be found and excavated.

Transmutating two different minerals produces new minerals and the surface awaits your work on delivering variety of transmutated minerals back to HQ.

I love the smell of zirconium in the morning.
  • Seabed filled with minerals
  • Lots of dialogue
  • No panic, you cannot die
  • Automatic packages..!
Controls 🎮
  • Move: ‘A’ and ‘D’
  • Excavate: Left mouse button
  • Collect: Right mouse button
  • Exit: Escapce
  • Toggle fullscreen: F11
  • Restart: f5
  • Fps counter: F1
Note

Made by myself, but couldn’t make it for the COMPO category.
